TopicTitle: Smoke/fire FX not showing behind engine, only glow.

Articles.Content: I have unmodded install, but had FAR in .23 and a few other versions, but I don't know if that would effect this. But is anyone else having this issue, and how can I fix it with out opening a folder and messing things up with my technical illiteracy?

Definitely pretty weird, but the only thing I can think of is to either unzip a new copy of the game (if you have the original zipfile from the Store), or to delete the contents of the GameData\Squad\Parts folder and then have the patcher (or Steam, if you're using a Steam install) verify the files and re-download the missing files.
